long_description: The REI LED Trail cap combines the sun protection of a baseball hat with the function of a small headlamp. It's great for reading at camp and using on the trail. Built-in LEDs can be set to flash mode, low beam or high beam with the simple push of a button inside the brim. Slim power-pack tucked under sweatband features 2 coin-size, easily replaceable CR2032 lithium batteries. Polyester mesh inserts at the sides improve airflow. Polyester sweatband wicks moisture away from forehead and dries quickly. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. The REI LED Trail cap has a webbing strap in back that adjusts the fit.
short_description: The REI LED Trail cap combines the sun protection of a baseball hat with the function of a small headlamp. It's great for reading at camp and using on the trail.
